name: Alpine Conditioning
description: Time spent in high altitudes and low temperatures have adapted you to them, and you're slightly better at resisting the cold.

name: Brutal Strength
description: Genetic defects have made your body incredibly strong.  Strength + 7.

name: Cybernetic Rejection
description: Whether physical or mental, your body just can't handle bionic implants, and has an intense negative reaction to them.  Installing any new bionics will cause severe negative side effects, scaling with the complexity of the bionic.
